It acts as Liver protective, Detoxifier Your Body and help release toxins from the body also traditionally used to boost the immune cardiovascular and metabolic systems. It detox your body and helps the body to fight foreign invaders and also has a role in repairing damage .It also improves digestion by increasing the secretion of bile and prevent skin diseases.
